title: Portfolio Homepage Render and AI Animation Load
description: Verify that the Portfolio Homepage loads correctly with professional profile and AI-enhanced animations playing smoothly.

steps.description: Navigate to the Portfolio Homepage URL
Check that the professional profile section is displayed
Verify that AI-powered animations are loaded and running without errors
Confirm page elements are responsive across multiple viewport sizes

title: Project Showcase Filtering Functionality
description: Verify the Project Showcase dynamic gallery filters projects correctly based on selected criteria.

steps.description: Navigate to the Project Showcase page
Apply a filter (e.g., project type or date) from the filtering UI
Check that the displayed projects update accordingly to the filter
Remove filter and verify full project list is restored

title: Detailed Case Study Content and Media Integration
description: Ensure case studies render narratives, stakeholder quotes, metrics, and embedded media correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to a case study page from Project Showcase
Verify narrative text is displayed completely with correct formatting
Check stakeholder quotes appear and are correctly attributed
Validate metrics visualizations render data as expected
Play embedded video or media content and verify playback functions without errors

title: About Section Career Timeline and Testimonials
description: Validate About page shows career timeline, achievements, and testimonials carousel functioning properly.

steps.description: Go to the About section
Confirm career timeline is displayed chronologically with correct content
Verify achievements are listed and visibly distinct
Interact with the testimonials carousel, navigate through all entries
Check carousel operates smoothly and testimonials update correctly

title: MDX Blog Post Rendering and Custom Components
description: Test that blog posts using MDX render correctly including headings, code blocks, and custom MDX components.

steps.description: Open a blog post page
Verify all Markdown elements such as headings, paragraphs and lists are rendered
Check custom MDX components like embedded media or callouts are shown correctly
Confirm syntax highlighting is applied on code blocks

title: 3D WebGL Scene Load and Interaction
description: Verify 3D WebGL scenes load fully on desktop and mobile devices and user interactions are responsive.

steps.description: Navigate to pages containing each of the 3D scenes (organic, neural, geometric)
Confirm scenes load without errors or long delays
Interact with the 3D scene (e.g., rotate, zoom, or hover)
Verify interactions respond smoothly and without glitches
Check performance metrics remain within acceptable thresholds

title: Animation System respects Reduced Motion Preferences
description: Ensure animations and page transitions via Framer Motion respect user OS settings for reduced motion.

steps.description: Set user operating system preference to Reduce Motion
Reload the website and navigate through several pages
Verify that animations and transitions are disabled or minimized
Revert OS setting and ensure animations resume normally

title: Newsletter Subscription Backend Integration and Analytics
description: Test the newsletter signup flow with backend subscription recording and analytics tracking.

steps.description: Submit a valid email address in the newsletter signup form
Confirm subscription success message displays
Verify the email is stored/recorded correctly in backend/email storage
Check that analytics events for subscription are logged correctly
Submit invalid email and verify validation error is shown

title: PWA Offline Support and Install Prompt
description: Validate Progressive Web App features including offline page availability and install prompts.

steps.description: Load the site with no network connection
Confirm offline pages display user-friendly message or cached content
Connect network, reload and trigger install prompt manually or via user interaction
Validate the PWA install prompt appears and behaves correctly

title: SEO Metadata and Structured Data Presence
description: Verify that all pages include correct SEO meta tags, structured data, and sitemap is generated properly.

steps.description: Load key pages (Homepage, Project Showcase, Blog post)
Inspect page headers for meta tags including title, description, keywords
Validate structured data JSON-LD scripts are present and conform to schema
Access sitemap.xml and confirm all relevant URLs are listed

title: Content Security Policy Headers and Nonce Enforcement
description: Test that CSP headers are correctly applied and nonce is used for script/style security without blocking valid content.

steps.description: Send request to site and inspect response headers for Content-Security-Policy correctness
Verify nonce attributes are attached to scripts/styles as per policy
Confirm no legitimate content/scripts/styles are blocked by CSP
Attempt injection of disallowed scripts and ensure they are blocked

title: Feature Flags Enable and Disable Features
description: Validate feature flag system correctly toggles feature availability and functionality during staged rollouts.

steps.description: Enable a feature flag in development environment
Check the related feature UI and functionality is active
Disable the feature flag
Verify the feature is hidden or disabled as expected

title: CDN and Asset Optimization Verify Reduced Load Times
description: Test CDN served assets are optimized in size, delivered quickly, and resource hints improve load efficiency.

steps.description: Load key pages and monitor asset delivery from CDN
Confirm images and scripts are served through CDN URLs
Validate resource hints like preconnect and preload tags are present in HTML
Measure page load times to ensure they meet performance benchmarks

title: Admin Email Testing Tool Functionality
description: Ensure the admin email testing page allows sending test emails and displays status results correctly.

steps.description: Access the admin email-test page
Input valid test email data and submit
Verify confirmation message of test email sent is displayed
Check for error handling by submitting invalid email or empty fields

title: Custom 404 Page Render and Navigation
description: Check that unknown routes render the custom 404 page with user-friendly messages and working navigation.

steps.description: Navigate to a non-existent URL path on the site
Verify the custom 404 page is displayed with appropriate message
Use 404 page navigation links or buttons to return to Homepage or other pages
Confirm navigation works without errors

title: Automated Test Suite Coverage and Pass Validation
description: Validate that the automated test suite runs all unit, integration, and accessibility tests with no failures.

steps.description: Run the complete Jest test suite including all component and integration tests
Check for zero failing test cases
Verify coverage reports meet minimum thresholds for critical modules

title: Lazy Loading and Critical CSS Performance Optimization
description: Ensure lazy loading works correctly for heavy components and critical CSS is applied for faster first paint.

steps.description: Access pages with lazy loaded components and monitor network requests
Verify lazy loaded components do not load until scrolled into view or needed
Check that critical CSS is inlined or loaded early for visible content
Measure page load performance metrics to validate improvements
